summary:
TL;DR: I am a relationship-driven, energetic, sales & biz ops strategist with a best-in-class managerial performance record, and a natural ability to build businesses through effective communication. 

I am obsessed with Revenue Enablement because it helps focus my skills to design impactful revenue generating programs that drive organizational growth, while guiding individual sellers to sales excellence.  I love developing people, and sales people are among the best <3 With a background rooted in coaching, technology, and sales, I have found my niche in Sales Enablement, where I can operate cross functionally and my expertise in sales & coaching truly shines. 

In almost every role, I have had CXOs, VPs & mentors call out my ability to make an impact at 50,000 feet with my proactive strategic mindset, and then straight down into the weeds to execute. I believe in solving problems at their root, and enjoy discovering and resolving the full context in a way that can grow top line results and bottom line success.

With a reliable focus on PEOPLE first, I am committed to fostering a culture of success and continuous improvement for every one on my team - Transparently 360 degrees, 24/7/365.

Expertise: 
  -Evaluating business strategy against insights to construct innovative solutions for growth…and execute them. Yes, I am a player-coach and big picture strategist who can be hands on as needed. No job is too big or too small.
  -Creating cross functional alignment and accountability.
  -Autonomously lead teams, projects, accounts, and customers with unparalleled care & genuine passion to enable others to success.
  -Driving operational excellence through leveraging intellectual curiosity, data deep dives & strategic communication.
  -Developing & mentoring leaders through building relationships, deep empathy, and a positive team mindset.
  -Effectively pulling big picture concepts into everyday goals through data literacy & learning integrations.

Skills: 
Leadership Development, Training & Coaching, Public Speaking, HR Strategy & Talent Development, Revenue Enablement & RevOps, Sales Methodologies, Direct Sales Strategies, SKO Execution, Onboarding, SMB to ENT Sales, SaaS, Strategic Marketing - especially GTM, Solution Design, Project  Management & Storytelling.

As a former founder with a successful exit under my belt, I have enjoyed consulting with other founders and guiding them through their own exits. Sales Enablement & Sales Leadership are my superpowers that will launch me to becoming an extraordinary Chief of Staff and 3x startup CEO.
headline: Sales Executive | Enablement Expert | Strategic GTM Advisor | Speaker | Coach | Innovation & AI Enthusiast | Lifelong Learner

educations.schoolName: D'Amore-McKim School of Business at Northeastern University
educations.activities: Anti-Trafficking advocate & volunteer mentor, Boston Initiative to Advance Human Rights (May 2009), Beta Gamma Sigma Business Scholar (April 2009), Teaching Assistant for 18 sections (460 students) of undergraduate, Senior-capstone, “Business Strategy in Action” courses (Lecturer for 4 sections) (2008-2009), International Business Club, Graduate Advisor (2006-2007)
Women's Track & Field, GO 'DOGS!, Student Athlete Advisory Board, Athletic Business Council, Kappa Kappa Gamma sorority, Phi Beta Kappa Honor Society.

position.title: Coaching and Consulting
position.description:
Expert coaching and consulting in business and athletics, specializing in change management, automation, and team development to drive success across Sales, Marketing, and GTM. 

Enhancing athlete experiences in Gymnastics, Cheerleading, Stunt, Track & Field, Pole Vault, Soccer, and Baseball through leadership, season planning, and culture transformation.

Certified Fitness Coach for HIIT-style workouts: VTL Box, Row, FIT, 30, 90, TKO.

position.title: Vice President of Revenue
position.description:
Q3 2025
- Promoted to VP of Revenue, on CRO Track: Adding Marketing and Customer Success to my OKRs
- Crushed an increased Team Quota, hitting 108%
- Effectively used 100% of my PTO - Spent July in Italy
- Achieve 98% retention for 3rd consecutive quarter

position.title: Vice President of Sales
position.description:
Joined a mission-driven team helping FQHCs (Federally Qualified Health Centers) retain Medicaid patients by automating coverage management. Tasked with scaling revenue and go-to-market (GTM) execution during a critical growth phase.

Key Achievements:

Q2 2025
-Beat Q4 record by another 178%; exceeding team quota by 216%; and exceeding avg ARR/Quarter by 298%
-Delivered a keynote presentation alongside national partners at a major industry event, elevating brand visibility and strengthening strategic alliances, resulting in $408k closed AT the even and $1.5M+ in live opportunities.

Q1 2025
-Defined and led the company’s first renewal cycle strategy with the Head of CS, resulting in 114% of business retained during the initial major renewal cycle.
-Launched a comprehensive GTM strategy featuring intent-based segmentation and a 360° demand generation campaign, improving inbound lead volume by 64× via existing channels.
-Streamlined sales operations, reducing time to contract by ~2 hours per deal.
-Recruited and expanded the GTM team by 40%, establishing scalable onboarding and a culture rooted in excellence and camaraderie.

Q4 2024
-Led new business sales team to the highest revenue quarter in company history, achieving 138% of quota.
-Secured a strategic partnership pipeline valued at 4× the current YoY ARR.
-Developed an interim territory strategy and implemented weekly GTM enablement sessions, including ICP and persona development by segment.

position.title: Sales Chief of Staff (to CEO)
position.description:
Brought in as a strategic consultant to support the CEO in aligning revenue functions for growth acceleration. In just 60 days, I delivered foundational go-to-market improvements and sales strategy pivots that directly contributed to the company’s highest revenue quarter to date (170% growth v 1H 2024).

Key Contributions:
-Defined Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs) and detailed Buyer Personas to sharpen targeting and messaging.
-Mapped the full Buying Process to align go-to-market efforts with real customer behavior.
-Led a transition from MEDDICC to SPICED sales methodology to better reflect consultative, buyer-led selling.
-Authored and implemented a new Sales Playbook, defining clear sales stages based on the buyer’s journey, and laying the groundwork for a Q1 SFDC re-design to create transparency in deals + accurate forecasting.
-Segmented target markets to inform a focused Q3 Marketing campaign, setting the foundation for a record-breaking Q4 Sales execution.

position.title: Global Director, Sales Enablement
position.description:
Sales Effectiveness
-Established workflow improvements for a team of remote & hybrid SDRs, boosting qualified lead conversion from 70% to 84%, adding over $120k into the AE pipeline, and enabling 75% of the team to reach quota within my first 30 days.
-Developed and executed a robust sales enablement strategy, prioritizing initiatives to support global strategy, leading close collaboration with 50+ stakeholders, including sales reps, support, solutions, success, and sales leadership. 
-Utilized data-driven insights to identify gaps in sales order form process, resulting in streamlined operations and reclaiming up to 2 hours/deal for representatives, boosting quota attainment across the sales organization an average of $4k/week/rep.

Sales Trainings & Events
-Designed and executed 7 Semi-Annual Sales Kickoffs across diverse locations for the GTM team, ensuring team unity, zero attrition over 24 months, standardized sales language, and enhanced KPIs with a 98% event satisfaction rating.
-Led the design and implementation of an optimized onboarding process, resulting in a 65% reduction in ramp time for Sales Development Representatives (SDRs), and 50% decrease in time to first deal for Account Executives (AEs).
-Developed expert understanding of Sales Cycle Management and Sales Methodology Criteria, including; MEDDPICC, SPICED, Challenger (& Jolt Effect) Sale, and Command of the Message.
-Directed API launch, including pre-launch sales enablement & SKO sessions, driving immediate sales readiness to achieve 83% conversion rate, w/22% increase & 2.5x sales growth for sN API.

position.title: Strategic Advisor to the CEO (Acquired)
position.description:
SalesCompete is a native Slack app that brings in-office sales floor energy & productivity back to sales teams. We enable sales teams to stay engaged, motivated, & productive with performance tracking, coaching, and enhanced team engagement. Learn more at salescompete.com.

As an advisor to the CEO, my responsibilities included tracking and measuring early stage sales growth for reporting, reviewing target lists, pitches, and content for viability and messaging, all while collaborating on the company’s first Sales Playbook and GTM Strategy.

position.title: Director, Marketing Operations & Enablement
position.description:
-Spearheaded the implementation of CRM & Marketing tools, enhancing efficiency & leading to a 24% increase in payment compliance and 100% participation in service hours for scholarship families.
-Led staff development by establishing performance standards and fostering a learning culture through onboarding, training, leadership programs for managers, and team-building initiatives.
-Designed, built and deployed complex automated Player Onboarding program for 2500 athletes across age, gender, family, schedule, and skill level, during the first season of covid-19 protocols, with 99%+ reliability.
-Co-authored female leadership criteria for 10-13 year old girls teams with the top female coach, who is a  FIFA legend, Olympic medalist, Golden Boot winner, and World Cup Champion.

position.title: Marketing Ops, Sales & Field Enablement
position.description:
2019-2021, Strategic Enablement (Contract): 
- Enabled local management groups to drive traffic and revenues through marketing leadership, community engagement, and insightful brand-building using social media marketing. 
- Partner Marketing and Enablement: Developed all promotion planning and execution, WOM strategies, built effective relationship marketing networks, and led in-store deployment with Regional and Store Managers to increase MRR/ARR in that vertical by over 60% for restaurant owners across the largest RTP market.   

2017-2019, Regional Director, Marketing Operations (Full-Time): 
- Built winning relationships across three major sales regions, and executed innovative business development opportunities to improve top-line sales with a 13% lift in revenue attributed to direct efforts.
- Provided strategic leadership through procuring and deploying Marketing Centric CRM integrated with multiple Zapier and API automation tools, designed data collection motion which led to an impactful visualization dashboard to provide insights used for optimizing regional Sales and Marketing initiatives.
- Enabled Marketing Leadership + Outbound Sales Team to utilize CRM, understand automation and ETL tools and make decisions from data dashboards, resulting in 180% increase in productivity, and automating 80% of B2B Marketing. 
- Coached Outbound Sales efforts, provided data-backed target-account list, developed all creative, did ride-alongs, prepped "on the spot" promotions, and led all event marketing initiatives.

position.title: Principal Software Trainer and Solutions Consultant

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Principal Software Trainer and Solutions Consultant

position.description:
- Highly specialized top trainer in data analytics and visualization courses for all levels of Tableau.  
- Led data solutions consulting projects, focused on storytelling with exceptional data.
- Facilitated live trainings, small group instruction, and private workshops for various software expertise, including: Tableau Fundamentals, Advanced Tableau Programming, Custom Tableau Course, Microsoft Excel, and Microsoft SharePoint.  
- Client base included all levels of management from companies including, Apple, Google, Federal Banks, PG&E, SF Public Library, Stanford University Medical Center, and multiple Private education institutions. AcademyX was a fun and professional company to work with.  
- My clients were tremendous learners and it was fun to watch them be pushed (way!) beyond their comfort zones to learn new skills, dive deeper into data analytics and visualizations, and learn incredible new (& functional!) insights about their business and SBU's.

fullPositions.title: Consultant and Facilitator
fullPositions.description:
Direct professional teams to improve self-awareness and emotional intelligence in order to build collaborative functionality of teams.  Offer new resources to non-profits and education based programs. 
 Support youth sports teams in building team mission, concept, and identity.

fullPositions.title: Founding Owner, General Manager & Transitional Consultant
Consumer Promotions Assistant Manager (Field Sales Enablement)
Retail Store & Sales Team Manager
fullPositions.description:
- Improved store from #58 in the company to #3 in 3 months. 
- Recognized as Rookie of the Year prior to leaving for Business School in 2006. 
- Regularly achieved 125+% personal sales quota, and 110+% team quota. 
- Led a team of 9 sales reps in inbound & cold outbound sales, developing a culture of customer-first sales, and leading the team to achieve over 100% of their quota MoM. 
- Developed a system to grow net new customers and achieve NRR growth, which was later adopted company-wide.

certifications.name: Document Workflow Automation for Sales Professionals
How to upsell from pdfFiller to signNow
Tableau Data Analytics - Expert Analyst & Designer

volunteering.title: EBSA Foundation Founding Board Member, then Business Liaison with EBSA
Business Coach & Transition Mentor for HERA Program

multiLocaleHeadline.en: Sales Executive | Enablement Expert | Strategic GTM Advisor | Speaker | Coach | Innovation & AI Enthusiast | Lifelong Learner
